singular.action.question: ❓ What do you want me to do?
singular.action.canceled: Okay, I won't do anything then.
singular.episode.aired.title: Episode {number_1} has aired!
singular.error.hijack: And what made you think you could click that button?
singular.error.permissions: You do not have permission to perform this action.
singular.keyStaff.creation.conflict: A task with the abbreviation {abbreviation_1} already exists!
singular.keyStaff.notFound: A Key Staff position with the abbreviation {abbreviation_1} was not found!
singular.project.creation.conflict: A project with the name `{nickname_1}` already exists!
singular.project.creation.failed.generic: An error occured while creating the project.
singular.project.creation.failed.badRequest:
An error occured while creating the project.
Please make sure the AniList ID is correct or that all fields are present.
singular.project.creation.success:
I created project `{nickname_1}` for you. You may want to consider the following:
1. `/keystaff add` to add positions
2. `/keystaff set-weight` to re-order positions
3. `/project edit`: `AniList` to set airing date/times, and `/air-reminder enable` to get airing notifications.
singular.project.delete.complete: Cleaned out the **{title_1}** project for you. 残念。
singular.project.delete.question:
Are you sure you want to delete **{title_1}**?
This action is irreversible.
singular.project.delete.title: Project Deletion
singular.project.modification.title: Project Modification
singular.project.resolution.failed: Could not resolve alias `{alias_1}` to a project.
